cli_entry_points.name: cli.py
cli_entry_points.description: Main entry point for the Antigravity Command System. Supports Context Bundling, Tool Discovery, and Protocol 128 Learning Operations (Snapshot, Debrief, Guardian, Soul Persistence). Decoupled from mcp_servers.

bundler.name: bundle.py
bundler.description: Bundles multiple source files into a single Markdown 'Context Bundle' based on a JSON manifest. Warns on deprecated legacy keys.

bundler.name: manifest_manager.py
bundler.description: Handles initialization and modification of the context-manager manifest. Acts as the primary CLI for the Context Bundler. Supports strict type validation.

bundler.name: validate.py
bundler.description: Validates context bundler manifest files against schema. Checks required fields, path format, path traversal attacks, and legacy format warnings.

rlm.name: cleanup_cache.py
rlm.description: Prunes stale or orphaned entries from the RLM Cache to ensure it matches the filesystem state.

rlm.name: debug_rlm.py
rlm.description: Debug utility to inspect the RLMConfiguration state. Verifies path resolution, manifest loading, and environment variable overrides. Useful for troubleshooting cache path conflicts.

rlm.name: distiller.py
rlm.description: Recursive summarization of repo content using Ollama.

rlm.name: inventory.py
rlm.description: RLM Auditor: Reports coverage of the semantic ledger against the filesystem. Uses the Shared RLMConfig to dynamically switch between 'Legacy' (Documentation) and 'Tool' (CLI) audit modes.

rlm.name: query_cache.py
rlm.description: RLM Search: Instant O(1) semantic search of the ledger.

rlm.name: rlm_config.py
rlm.description: Central configuration factory for RLM. Resolves cache paths and loads manifests.

documentation.name: export_mmd_to_image.py
documentation.description: Renders all .mmd files in docs/architecture_diagrams/ to PNG images. Run this script whenever diagrams are updated to regenerate images.

documentation.name: analyze_tracking_status.py
documentation.description: Generates a summary report of AI Analysis progress from the tracking file. Shows analyzed vs pending forms for project management dashboards.

documentation.name: generate_todo_list.py
documentation.description: Creates a prioritized TODO list of forms pending AI analysis. Bubbles up Critical and High priority items based on workflow usage.

documentation.name: capture-code-snapshot.js
documentation.description: Generates a single text file snapshot of code files for LLM context sharing.

documentation.name: workflow_inventory_manager.py
documentation.description: Manages the workflow inventory for agent workflows (.agent/workflows/*.md). Provides search, scan, add, and update capabilities. Outputs are docs/antigravity/workflow/workflow_inventory.json and docs/antigravity/workflow/WORKFLOW_INVENTORY.md.

curate.name: manage_tool_inventory.py
curate.description: Comprehensive manager for Tool Inventories. Supports list, add, update, remove, search, audit, and generate operations.

curate.name: vibe_cleanup.py
curate.description: Maintenance script to clean up temporary/vibe files (logs, temp artifacts) from the workspace to ensure hygiene.

investigate.name: next_number.py
investigate.description: Generates the next sequential ID number for project artifacts (ADRs, Tasks, Specs) by scanning the filesystem for existing files.

Orchestrator.name: workflow_manager.py
Orchestrator.description: Manages the lifecycle of Agent Workflows (Start, Step, End). Tracks state in workflow_state.json.

orchestrator.name: proof_check.py
orchestrator.description: Validates task completion by checking file modifications against the Git index. Ensures Proof of Work.

root.name: cli.py
root.description: Universal Tool & Workflow Router. The primary interface for Tool Discovery and Workflow Execution.

root.name: cortex_cli.py
root.description: Main CLI entry point for the Cortex Agentic Operations (Protocol 128). Orchestrates Cognitive functions (Memory, Learning, Debrief, Stats).

root.name: domain_cli.py
root.description: Domain-Specific CLI for managing specific Project Entities (Tasks, ADRs, Chronicles, Protocols). Maps CLI commands to MCP business logic.

root.name: env_helper.py
root.description: Simple environment variable helper with proper fallback (Env -> .env). Ensures consistent secret loading across Project Sanctuary.

root.name: hf_decorate_readme.py
root.description: Prepares the local Hugging Face staging directory for upload. Modifies 'hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md' in-place with YAML frontmatter per ADR 081.

root.name: hf_upload_assets.py
root.description: Synchronizes staged landing-page assets with the Hugging Face Hub (ADR 081). Uploads the final, metadata-rich README.md to the repository root.

root.name: hf_utils.py
root.description: Hugging Face utility library for soul persistence (ADR 079). Encapsulates huggingface_hub logic. Provides unified async primitives for uploading files, folders, and updating datasets.

root.name: smart_fix_links.py
root.description: Auto-repair utility for broken Markdown links using a file inventory.

root.name: upload_to_huggingface.py
root.description: Manages the upload of model weights, GGUF files, and metadata to Hugging Face Hub (Phase 6). Handles artifact selection, repo creation, and secure transport.

root.name: verify_links.py
root.description: Verifies the integrity of internal links across the documentation base. Part of Protocol 128 validation.

retrieve.name: fetch_tool_context.py
retrieve.description: Retrieves the 'Gold Standard' tool definition from the RLM Tool Cache and formats it into an Agent-readable 'Manual Page'. This is the second step of the Late-Binding Protocol, following query_cache.py which finds a tool, this script provides the detailed context needed to use it.

utils.name: path_resolver.py
utils.description: Standardizes cross-platform path resolution and provides access to the Master Object Collection (MOC). Acts as a central utility for file finding.

utilities.name: pathResolver.js
utilities.description: Node.js implementation of path resolution logic.

utilities.name: rlmConfigResolver.js
utilities.description: Resolves RLM configuration paths for Node.js tools.
